db:select.doc:name: Get combined orders and orderdetails records
db:select.db:sql: select orders.orderNumber, orderDate, requiredDate, shippedDate, status, comments, customerNumber, orderdetails.productCode, orderdetails.quantityOrdered, orderdetails.priceEach, orderdetails.orderLineNumber from orders join orderdetails on orders.orderNumber = orderdetails.orderNumber ;
